plot: A bumbling Italian immigrant seeks the good life in America, only to realize it's not so good with his bookie cousin on the New Jersey shore.
title: The Black Sheep
plot_es: A bumbling Italian immigrant seeks the good life in America, only to realize it's not so good with his bookie cousin on the New Jersey shore.
plot_en: A bumbling Italian immigrant seeks the good life in America, only to realize it's not so good with his bookie cousin on the New Jersey shore.
